greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(n,8).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = 1 + [2|n] + 2*[4|n] + 4*[8|n], where [x|y] = 1 when x divides y, 0 otherwise.
Multiplicative with a(p^e) = gcd(p^e, 8). - _David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005
Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)*(1 + 1/2^s + 2/4^s + 4/8^s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 04 2011
results.author: _Mitch Harris_
